comments.body: I have a doubt here, see https://streams.spec.whatwg.org/#ws-constructor

>The controller object passed to start, write and close is an instance of `WritableStreamDefaultController`

I think these changes are good, or can you explain your doubt more?

See https://streams.spec.whatwg.org/#default-writer-prototype

> It will be null if the stream is errored, or zero if the stream is closed.

See https://streams.spec.whatwg.org/#blqs-size
> (If the chunk doesn’t have one, it will return undefined, causing the stream using this strategy to error.)

**Question**:
Sometimes chunk is `any`, sometimes `ArrayBufferView`. I could not understand from the documentation if there is something wrong here.
